name: mobile-skeleton-app
description: A complete cross-platform mobile app skeleton with React Native and Node.js backend

scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd mobile-app && npm install"
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:mobile
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run db:setup
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist
